attributes.action: Create payment Vouchers For under Eighteens Which Cannot be Redeemed on Age Related Products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to combat the problems associated with underage drinking and smoking, buying of solvents and knives i put forward a petition to introduce a payment scheme for under eighteens where vouchers are used instead of sterling. These vouchers could not be redeemed against any age related products, therefore preventing the sale of such items to persons under eighteen.
